Megaton:I'm Megaton. Learn it well because if you don't get out of my 
way it will be the sound of your doom. That kid has to much potential 
I won't lose my spot as the most powerful bot in the universe.
 They continued dueling. Mustex was stronger than in the future,but 
not as experienced so Megaton had the advantage.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., dewboy30816@y... wrote:
>  Mustex didn't know who this guy was and he didn't care. He grabbed 
> the new bot he had dubbed Stallex and jumped out of the way. He 
drew 
> his bow.
> Mustex:Sword mode.
> It straighten into his double-bladded sword and he charged. The 
> creature spat out a sword made of ice, transformed to his freakish 
> robot mode, and met him head-on.
> Musex:Who are you?
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., dewboy30816@y... wrote:
> >  He realized Mustex didn't come out of either pod and must have 
> been 
> > online for sometime. One of the protoforms must have gone 
offline. 
> > Then he saw the Maximal insignia on Mustex and knew he had lost 
the 
> > protoform. Worse yet the new bot looked like a BABY, it had to be 
> > weak now, but it could be a formidable opponent in the future if 
it 
> > went through the same gradual upgrades as humans. He wouldn't 
allow 
> > it to happen. HE was the maost powerful bot in the universe, and 
it 
> > would stay that way. He transformed to dragon mode and spit fire 
at 
> > the 2 bots...

scanned

would

> from

> to 
> > show they
> > > were ever there.
> > > 
> > > Megaton reached out and touched the wall, a sudden charge of 
> energy 
> > forced
> > > the large bot away from the wall. He held up his hand and 
scanned 
> > it for an
> > > energy signature only to find nothing had happened to him. The

> > > reveal one oddity though. A thin layer of berries, sap, and mud 
> had 
> > coated
> > > his fingers. The wall paintings were wet like they were drawn 
an 
> > hour ago
> > > instead of  years past.
> > > 
> > > The mutant exited the cave ansd scanned the world. two pods 
> weren't 
> > far
> > > away. The beast transformed to his T-Rex form and went to 
> > investigate. once
> > > nearby he detected animals, three of them. from the looks of 
> things 
> > there

> tail

> > > be replicated.) After the two creatures ran away he continued 
to

recognized.
